title: Reality.Show.S01.720p.HDTV.x264-Scene
description:
Disgraced reality TV producer Mickey Wagner stakes his comeback on a revolutionary idea - a reality show that's actually real. Reality Show follows Mickey Wagner (Adam Rifkin), a down on his luck reality show producer, as he crafts a sensational comeback. Fed up with how staged and phony reality shows are, Mickey's hatches a revolutionary idea to pick an average American family and put them under all-encompassing surveillance...without the family's knowledge. The concept is to let real life unfold before the cameras. However, the family is numbingly boring. And the studio wants more sizzle. So Mickey starts to introduce drama into the unwitting family's lives. Temptation to cheat, drinking, work problems.... chaos ensues. Everything unravels in a big, big way with shocking consequences.

################

Mickey believes he has found the perfect family, but it turns out they are completely boring. Yielding to pressure to spice up the show, Mickey begins to interfere with the family, but only so much as his conceit is not in jeopardy.

Episode Name: The Sizzle Reel
Season: 1
Episode: 2
Aired: 2012-11-08

Episode Overview:
Mickey continues to feel mounting pressure from the network as an affiliates dinner is fast approaching and they need something to sell to advertisers. Yielding to pressure from the network to get these people to do somethingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦anythingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦that will keep viewers from changing the channel, or face the disgrace of his show being cancelled, Mickey interferes with the Warwicks anniversary dinner and sets their teenage daughter Amy up for a night she will never forget. But will it be enough, for the network to leave Mickey alone and let him return to making reality that is actually real?

Episode Name: Product Placement
Season: 1
Episode: 3
Aired: 2012-11-15

Episode Overview:
Good news, the network LOVES the sizzle reel and advertisers are clamoring to be a part of this show. The network has just nabbed some pretty impressive product placement deals and they insist that Mickey figure out a way to manipulate things so that the Warwicks are seen on camera using the items. Forced to comply, Mickey surreptitiously integrates the products into the show. Disaster strikes quickly as Amy is accidentally poisoned by one of the products. Mickey and his team sit watching through their all seeing eye, wrestling between the urge to save her life and the desire to not ruin their show.

Episode: 5

Dennis has a heartbroken teenage daughter to deal with at home. Mickey sees this as a golden opportunity; he employs Yvonne, an actress, to enroll in AmyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s school with one goal, to help nudge Amy off her goody-goody path. Try as he might to find another job, Mickey uses his trickery to make sure Dennis stays unemployedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s better for the show. Episode Name: Manipulation
Season: 1
Episode: 6

Episode Overview:
Mickey and the network are pissed that Dennis refuses to take the bait and cheat on his wife. The network tells Mickey he better figure something out and fast. Mickey feels that even though Dennis wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t stray, maybe he can manipulate things to get Katherine to cheat. SheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been frustrated lately and may be open to the opportunity. Episode Name: Roadkill
Season: 1
Episode: 7

Episode Overview:
MickeyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s attempts to win his ex girlfriend back are fruitless and his obsession with her is clouding his professional life. To add insult to injury, the network president who bought the show has been fired and the new network administration wants to give the show a happy ending. Mickey is furious. Meanwhile the Warwicks couldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be more at odds. Katherine is seeking comfort with Chad, Dennis is emasculated and Amy is in even more trouble at school. Mickey complies with the networkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s demands with a brilliant ideaÃ¢â‚¬Â¦a missing dog will definitely bring this fragmented family back together again. After all, it worked the last time. But this time, MickeyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s incompetent assistants let the dog slip through their fingers and what was supposed to be a happy ending, turns out to be anything but.
